rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Garage
rooms.description: This is the main entrance with a split-level reception leading to two-car garage, ensuring easy wheelchair access. Vastu principle: North-facing entry for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space adjacent to the entrance with large windows facing east for morning light, designed in Colonial style.
features: Sliding doors leading to central courtyard

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A green space acting as the heart of the house with a water fountain and seating area, following Vastu guidelines for natural flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Colonial kitchen on the ground floor, wheelchair accessible with wide countertops and open layout to allow visibility into the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated, quiet home office space, designed for bachelor pad productivity with natural light from east-facing windows.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Large, accessible entry door with automatic mechanism. Placed in the north to align with Vastu.

openings.name: Window to Living Room
openings.description: East-facing windows for morning sunlight, enhancing energy efficiency and aesthetics.

openings.name: Sliding Glass Door
openings.description: Sliding door connecting living room to central courtyard for fluid indoor-outdoor transition.

openings.name: Garage Entrance
openings.description: Door leading from the garage to the ground floor, ensuring accessibility and direct access.
